video_identification.title: The Great March of Return Demonstrations #gaza #freepalestine

extracted_metadata.description: The Great March of Return Demonstrations that were held weekly in #Gaza during 2018-2019 are one of the many efforts Palestinians have been making to pursue their right of return. Listen to Dr. Yaara Bengar Alaluf in the new episode of our podcast in Hebrew that tells the story of Gaza through the lens of #nakba #exile and #return â€¦...more ...more Show less
